about.title: About
about.storyPara1: MKB Tours & Travel was founded with a vision to make every journey comfortable, safe, and memorable. Based in Mumbai, we have been serving travelers across India for over 5 years with reliable transportation and customized tour packages.
about.storyPara2: From hill stations and beach holidays to spiritual pilgrimages and heritage tours, we design each trip with personal care, professional drivers, and well-maintained vehicles to ensure a smooth travel experience.
about.storyPara3: Today, MKB Tours & Travel is trusted by 1000+ happy travelers, offering door-to-door pickup, flexible itineraries, 24/7 support, and premium service across Maharashtra, Goa, Gujarat, Karnataka, and beyond.
about.missionQuote: Safe Journeys. Trusted Service. Memorable Experiences.
about.passionDesc: We love what we do, and it reflects in the care and attention we give to every journey we craft.
about.excellenceDesc: From clean vehicles to professional drivers and well-planned itineraries, we deliver premium travel experiences.
about.customerDesc: Your comfort, safety, and satisfaction are our highest priorities on every journey.
about.safetyDesc: Verified drivers, well-maintained vehicles, and transparent pricing ensure a worry-free travel experience.
